contents:
https://twitter.com/shawnwzhang/status/1158906976392192000

目前我看到的有关相关中国学生要受校方处分的信息就只有这个，主流媒体似乎没找到过。这个信息有一定可靠性，但最终处理结果，我不认为奥克兰大学有足够的胆量真把他遣回国

“updates about University of Auckland assault: Edric Liu, one of the Chinese students in the video, says university is about to discipline him and is contacting Chinese Consulate for help. He believes he can finish school.”
